name: XpCade 3 Prototype
description:
This is the prototype for the update of XpCade on Steam. Until I'll not publish it, you can test it here.

In this game you can:

- play an arcade game

- drive a car on a wasteland terrain

- complete missions

- program your minigames by using theAdapter language

more info on spacespacesofware,com

Please leave your comments and suggestions down below!
